name: Block Path
description:
This game was made for the JimJam in under 48 hours!

Its a puzzle game with 12 levels. Use the arrow keys to move around, and if you really mess up you can restart the level with the Space bar.

As you move around you leave a path of blocks. Be careful though! The path of blocks may block your path! Can you maneuver the stages to get to the exit correctly?
